tweets.text:
The premiers and I are focused on building one strong Canadian economy.

It‚Äôs time to break down internal trade barriers. It‚Äôs time that workers certified in one province are allowed to work anywhere in the country. It‚Äôs time to build big things without rounds of red tape.

We‚Äôre stronger when we‚Äôre united, and it‚Äôs time to unite.

Nous sommes plus forts lorsque nous sommes unis, et il est temps de s'unir.

We‚Äôre taking immediate action to protect Canadian workers against the United States‚Äô trade war.

We‚Äôre waiving the one-week EI waiting period. We‚Äôre making it so that you don‚Äôt have to exhaust your severance pay before collecting EI. We‚Äôre changing the system in every region to make it easier for you to access your benefits.

These are new, temporary changes. They're going to keep workers supported ‚Äî and keep Canada strong against any challenge.
